Content Guidelines

Last Updated: March 19, 2024

1. Introduction

These Content Guidelines are designed to help you understand what content is acceptable on GGShorts. By using our platform, you agree to follow these guidelines and help us maintain a positive and respectful community.

2. Prohibited Content

The following types of content are strictly prohibited:

  • Hate speech or discriminatory content
  • Violent or graphic content
  • Sexual content or nudity
  • Harassment or bullying
  • Spam or misleading content
  • Copyright infringement
  • Impersonation or fraud
  • Illegal activities or content

3. Content Quality Standards

To maintain a high-quality platform, all content should:

  • Be original and authentic
  • Be relevant to gaming and entertainment
  • Be properly categorized and tagged
  • Have clear audio and video quality
  • Include appropriate descriptions and titles

4. Community Guidelines

4.1 Respectful Interaction

All users should:

  • Treat others with respect
  • Engage in constructive discussions
  • Report inappropriate content
  • Follow platform-specific rules

4.2 Content Moderation

We reserve the right to:

  • Remove content that violates our guidelines
  • Suspend or terminate accounts
  • Report illegal activities to authorities
  • Update these guidelines as needed

5. Copyright and Intellectual Property

Users must respect intellectual property rights:

  • Only upload content you own or have permission to use
  • Properly credit original creators
  • Respect copyright laws and fair use guidelines
  • Report copyright violations

6. Content Recommendations

For the best results, we recommend:

  • Creating original gaming content
  • Using high-quality recording equipment
  • Adding engaging descriptions and tags
  • Interacting with your audience
  • Following trending topics in gaming

7. Enforcement

Violations of these guidelines may result in:

  • Content removal
  • Account warnings
  • Temporary suspension
  • Permanent account termination

8. Updates to Guidelines

We may update these guidelines periodically to reflect changes in our community standards and platform features. Users will be notified of significant changes.

9. Contact Us

If you have questions about these guidelines or need to report violations, please contact us at:

Email: content@ggshorts.com
